thread.title: Protesters interrupt Trump during rally
thread.title_full: Protesters interrupt Trump during rally - CNNPolitics.com

author: Noah Gray
title: Protesters interrupt Trump during rally
text:
Miami (CNN) Groups of protesters disrupted Donald Trump's speech here three times on Friday night.
His supporters vigorously drowned out the protesters with boos, cheers and shouts of "USA," We want Trump" and "Go home."
Some Trump supporters also jostled the protesters and called them "illegals" as they were booted from the event by campaign staff and security.
The hectic scene here at Donald Trump's event in Miami pic.twitter.com/IhOistalyD
â€” Jeremy Diamond (@JDiamond1) October 23, 2015 "Don't hurt 'em, don't hurt 'em," said Trump, mindful that past protests have pushed some of his supporters to physical violence. "You can get 'em out, just don't hurt 'em."
Trump added, "That's what freedom of speech is about."
Read More There were three separate groups of protesters, but only a handful in each group. As the third disruption of protesters broke out, Trump warned any potential hecklers that he would not be so nice if they interrupted him again.
He continued to fire up his supporters who had gathered at his National Miami Doral resort.
"Isn't this more fun than having like a normal deal?" Trump asked. "This is more fun, right?"
